Ben Andrews (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Andrews_(actor) 0 Ben Andrews (May 16, 1942 – May 13, 1981) was an American actor best remembered for his television work. Ben_Andrews ( May_16_,_1942 – May_13 , 1981 ) was an_American_actor_best remembered for his_television_work .
